review_text: Perfect place to stay if visiting a student at Lock Haven. For us it was perfect to stay and attend my son's graduation. I love when host are quick to respond and Zachariah and Diana are those type of host.
Great stay. Clean. And easy/quick communication
Hosts were very lovely and very responsive. This place was just what we were looking for.
The home does fine for a quick stay. Minimal expectations. Clean beds, basic necessities. Photos aren't exact to how the home is set up. The area of Lock Haven is beautiful.
Had everything we expected
Our second time staying here visiting family. Excellent communication and the house is very clean and equipped with everything we needed for a three week stay. Highly recommend.
House was as expected. Would rent again.
Excellent communication. Exceptionally clean and had everything we needed to prepare meals. Beds were very comfortable too. Plan to rent again soon. Great location as we have family in the area.
Enjoyed a quick stay in Lock Haven with my friend. The best part were their super comfortable couches, it was tempting to lounge in them all day!
Clean and a great location to go to a Penn State football game. Enjoyed your stay.

Perfect home and location for attending events at or near Lock Haven University. Easily walkable to all things on main campus. Shops and restraunts on Main St would be a longer walk, but definitely doable on nice weather days.
The home itself is great and had all of the necessary amenities without being cluttered. Everything was clean and tidy.
We brought our dog along with us, so especially appreciated having the back porch and yard area. Our pup also enjoyed walks to the LHU campus (sidewalk on both sides of street to and from).
There was an unexpected delay at check in time that was handled swiftly by our host.
Thank you to Zachariah and family for sharing your home!
Very clean, comfortable beds, nice place.

Zachariah’s place was excellent. We attended the White Out game at Penn State and it was perfect! It was a very cozy home which was awesome after a long day in the rain. The bed was extremely comfortable and the house is located in a very quiet area. Highly recommended!

There are three bedrooms with plenty of space.
Lines are soft and beds comfortable.
Location gréât for the university events.
The place was cozy, and Zachariah, the host, provided excellent customer service.
This is the second time we have stayed. The place is easy to find and close to the university. If you are going to a sporting event at the university this is a great proximity to stay.
This house what amazing and it was very clean and calm.
Nice house, very well equipped, perfect for a long or short stay in this splendid region. Thank you to our host!

My son is playing football at Lock Haven University and we were there to move him into his dorm, and we felt very welcomed an at home in Zach’s place. He is very responsive and friendly. We hope to make this place our regular home away from home when visiting our son and going to football games.
Clear instructions, as described. Missing an iron, but everything else was perfect.

Zachariah was easy to get in touch with. He messaged back in minutes of me reaching out. The house was very clean and had everything needed in a home rental. The home decor was very nice, comfortable and inviting. Easy to find in a quiet neighborhood, and minutes away from food, stores, gas station etc. We would definitely stay here again.
He was very quick to respond and cordial!

Zachariah home was exactly how it was described! Clear and easy directions to get into the house. Although this is an older home, it was “VERY”clean. The home had a lot of extra amenities. Even lawn chairs for out back for the fire pit. My family and I felt very comfortable. I would highly recommend this place.

Great Host
Very responsive
Pet friendly
We will be back next time we are in town!
We had a great girls trip to a local wine festival. Zachariah’s house was the perfect place to stay - close to what we needed, comfortable/cozy, and easy! Thanks for hosting us!!

Overall the stay was nice. I recommend parking in the back of the house instead of the driveway to avoid walking up the steps and possibly hurting yourself. The host was very accommodating and flexible as I was in town with a few family members for a funeral and needed to adjust our check out date slightly.
Just what we needed for our trip. A place to hang our hat overnight with comfortable surroundings. We walked our dogs on the nearby Lock Haven campus.

We needed a place to stay close to Lock Haven University where our son will be attending in the fall and will be playing football. We knew nothing about the area, and we feel so much better after this weekend. We felt like we were exactly in the middle of where we needed to be! The place was perfect size, super clean, pet friendly-as we brought our dog with us, and decorated cute! Zachariah also responded quickly every time I reached out to him with a question before we came. Definitely planning on staying again!

This is the second time we’ve stayed at this property. Very clean, convenient location to stores, restaurants and the great outdoors!
Property was clean, check in easy, and clutter free.
The place was great for us to spend time away from home together while I had drill. It was clean & as we said the bed was perfectly comfy to sleep.

Great little house for a quick overnight for a group of 5. Our toddlers loved the bunk beds. There were a few stray dog hairs around, but it was still a very clean house overall that is well furnished. Thank you!
Great host, highly recommended!
Check in was flexible but easy using the instructions provided. The house is well kept and spacious.
Really enjoyed the communication with the host. First time in an AirBnB. Very pleased and will use again.
A great place to stay! It was easy to find and we loved having the long drive that took you away from the road. Easy to get find the key and get inside. Will stay again. Thanks!
We really enjoyed our stay. the home was very comfortable and nice. Location was great for getting together with family and friends

This home had everything our family needed for a comfortable stay. We had to leave early due to weather and Zachariah was understanding. It was so nice to have a clean place where we could have our dogs stay with us and we appreciate that! Everything was as expected and we had no complaints. :)
We adored this home. It was exactly as described and super clean. We will definitely book here again.

This was our first air bnb stay and we were nervous. Communication was great and responses were almost immediate. The house was clean and the perfect fit for us. I will definitely be staying there again.

The house was a great stay, I would recommend for anyone looking for a quick getaway! Zachariah was very responsive and helpful and friendly as well! The place was very well kept and had everything we needed. (:
House was very comfortable and well kept. Kitchen was stocked with all necessities. Looking forward to booking again.
Great place to gather with a couple of old college buddies. Thanks for hosting us!
An amazing find! Very clean & comfortable. 10/10 would stay here again.
Was a nice place and exactly what we needed for the night. Close to a lot of little local spots in Lock Haven.
Quiet spot near campus!!!
Super easy to access, great price, convenient location, well equipped.
Good for what we needed

This home was beautiful, aesthetically pleasing to say the least, very nice location and close to downtown Lock Haven. Host was very friendly and check-in was a seamless process. Look forward to staying here in the future!
Nice place, dog friendly!
Great stay! Would love to stay again!
The place was a perfect stay. It had everything one could need, a nice kitchen, clean, and nicely located. about 30 minute drive from downtown Williamsport and just next to the university

Seamless self check-in. We only stayed there a few hours to sleep but the bedrooms were good. Only thing was the bathroom didn’t have any soap, luckily there was some in the kitchen. Otherwise, it worked out for a stop on our way to Penn State.
A great place to stay. We will be back!!

I think it’s the best stay from last 10. It is like stop by at dad’s house). Quite location, parking on site. With pleasure will stay another 3-4 days but it’s already booked. 100% next guest will be gabby to stay there too
Great host! The location was perfect, house was clean, had everything we could need for our stay, and was easy to access. Zachariah made this a stress -free trip.
The house was exactly as described. The beds are comfortable, the house is clean, and the proximity to town is wonderful, yet it is quiet and peaceful. We would rent again.

My husband, son and I loved Zachariah’s place. It was quaint, in a great location and was perfect for what we needed. When we needed a little extra time for check-out communication was fast. It was accurately described and we didn’t have issues with the AC which was nice.
It was great to have a place in Lock Haven that allowed dogs, so that is why we chose to stay here. That being said, the cost was high for what it was.
House was great and check in was super easy. Walking distance to LHU campus. Will definitely visit again.
Great stay, very cozy. Check-in and communication was very smooth. Also great value!

Wonderful home in a quiet yet convenient location. House is comfortably cool. Rooms are good sizes with very comfortable beds. Kitchen is well stocked and open to the dining area. Lovely small backyard.
Zach’s home was inviting, warm, and quaint. He was responsive to all questions and even helped us when we left a few belongings behind.
This is a marvelous home. Well maintained and furnished. Owner was easily to contact and quick with responses. Actually looking forward to returning there on our return trip.

The good:
The house was clean and conveniently located. It was well stocked with useful items and more than large enough for our group.
The bad:
When we arrived at the house, which was later in the evening, the indoor home temperature was 85 degrees and the air conditioning was turned off. While we were able to decrease the temperature, it took until 5 am to do so. This made for a fairly restless night. Also, the home was advertised as having central air conditioning and it did not. One room, the one with bunk beds, was not air conditioned at all and only had a fan. Another room had a window unit and there were two mini-split units placed in other rooms.

Spent a month June into July 2022. Very comfortable and private. The song of the Wood Thrush greets the morning. Donated a couple of table lamps as they are generally lacking in Airbnb’s. Host was helpful and welcoming.

Lovey home with everything you need for your stay! The driveway provides ample parking and the house itself was clean and well maintained. All supplies were easily accessible. Check in and check out were easy! Highly recommend.
We enjoyed this airbnb very much. It was very clean, very convenient to our needs and very spacious.
House was very clean and organized
The place was perfect for what we needed. Would stay again.

Overall good stay. Close to Main Street, Lock Haven University and things to do. Bedrooms were good with comfortable beds. Good kitchen amenities. The place could have been a bit cleaner, specifically the bathroom. Pictures in the listing do not show the close proximity of the homes on both sides. Zachariah was a nice host and overall I would recommend this Airbnb.
Great spot, close to town and easy check in. Nice and clean, next time I’m in town I will look to book here again.

The house had a great living room set up. The pillow top beds were very comfortable. I was pleasantly surprised with the amount of supplies that are there for our use. The weekend we came it snowed 7 inches and they had someone there to do the driveway and the walkways 😁 Will be staying here again on my next business trip
Great location, host was very responsive. House was great, large bedrooms and comfortable beds. Living room was so nice to visit with family! Definitely want to stay again!

Easy to book home great for a brief stay in Lock Haven! Very clean interior premises and all necessities were provided. Owners are great on communication and rapidly respond to messages. My son left his glasses there and the owners rapidly located them for us along with shipping them back to our home -- many thanks for this!
The primary area that I would suggest improvement on is: more accurate depiction and description of what the back/sides of the property look like. From the listing photos it appeared that it was in a somewhat private location when in fact we were surrounded by many other homes. This really only mattered to me because we brought our two relatively large dogs (yes, they are pet friendly here!) and taking them outside was somewhat challenging and lacking in any privacy given the tight confines of the property lines and closely neighboring homes.
Overall though I would certainly recommend this home if you're in need of an economical (and again, PET FRIENDLY) lodging option in the Lock Haven area.
THANK YOU
Great stay…spacious and comfortable in every way!!!
Great place to stay in Lock Haven. Close to all the outdoors.

Great communication! We ended up getting there a day later due to weather and Zachariah offered for us to stay the next night to make up for it (we needed to get home, but appreciated the offer). We also had a last-minute additional person and he was happy to let us tack that friend on. The house itself is clean, full of everything you could need, and a perfect location for so many activities in and around the Lock Haven area.
Convenient home in a good spot. Two of the bedrooms had overpowering odors. Good communication but lack of snow shovel made it difficult to leave during a snow storm. High price for what you get.
Absolutely wonderful host who was very accommodating and helped with any questions we had immediately. Absolutely will be staying again in the future
We really enjoyed staying at Zachariah’s place. Check in was easy and the house was clean. Would love to stay again.

We stayed over Christmas and it warmed my heart when I saw a Christmas tree in the window as we approached the house! There was even a wrapped present with our name on it! So sweet and thoughtful!
The house was just as described.
Very comfortable, good value stay.

Zachariah was a great host with efficient communication whenever we had a quick question for him. The home is a great deal, as it has 3 bedrooms and a decent sized living room with a very comfortable sectional couch. We enjoyed hanging in the living room and playing games at the kitchen table. Very kid friendly as there wasn't much that my toddlers could get into and either destroy or hurt themselves with. :-)
Very satisfied withour stay. Will be staying again.

Nicely kept older home in a quiet part of town. Check in was very simple and easy. We were in town for a Penn State game. Very good price and scenic drive if you are willing to travel a little from State College!
Very comfortable enjoyable stay. Highly recommended. Would stay again.
Our stay was great house is located very close to Lock Haven University. It has everything you would need for cooking, living room is really comfortable with nice sectional and big screen Tv.
very nice and cozy home. very clear instructions and very prompt response from owner. if you are staying on lock heaven I will certainly recommend this air bnb
Great place. Clean. Good location.

A comfortable house close to the university and downtown Lock Haven. We enjoyed exploring the area's many trails and State Parks. It was nice to be able to come back to a nicely appointed kitchen, a hot shower, and a comfortable bed after a day of biking or hiking through a really beautiful part of PA.
House was very welcoming. It was tidy and well stocked. Hosts were communicative, helpful and receptive to feedback, though things were straightforward and we really didn't need to touch base much.
We had a great stay! Some friends and I stayed here after a PSU game. It had everything we needed and Zachariah was very accommodating. Would stay again if we’re in the area!
Such a convenient location. Very cute, comfortable home!
A great stay with great amenities
Very nice and super clean. The owner was very responsive and super accommodating. Definitely worth the stay!
This is a nice house near the university. It furnishings are nice and check in was simple.

Peaceful and quiet. Just what I was looking forward to as I work almost the equivalent of 2 FT jobs. We were in the area for a friend's wedding and this was the perfect place to stay. Went a few days earlier than the wedding to make the trip a mini vacation. I would definitely stay at this location again!
Absolutely beautiful quaint place. Loved the set up. Highly recommended and will definitely stay again.
Great little place. It was exactly what we needed for the weekend.

Brenda was an excellent hostess. She got the place ready and we had the option to check in before 3:00pm. We ended up getting a late start so we arrived much later than we wanted to. When I updated her on our arrival she wrote back and said she would turn the outside light and the kitchen light on for us.
Thank you for great facilities, amenities, and hospitality, Brenda!
It was a perfect setup for a couple to stay there! Very clean and loved the setup! Plus the view on the walk out the door was nice! Thank you again for everything :)
Our stay was awesome. Easy to find and check-in. Very clean and comfortable. Our host was responsive and the entire stay was easy from start to finish.
A nice place to stay. Was in a quiet and peaceful area. The size was perfect for a single person trip.

2 nights at Brenda’s place was great for visiting our son at Penn State for a long weekend. A little further out from campus than I’d like, but the small, clean & comfortable apartment (bedroom, full bath, full kitchen & living room) was perfect and much more affordable than being in a hotel close to campus.
Fantastic place, when I had a mishap they were easy to contact response within 5 minutes 5 out of 5

Brenda and Doug were amazing host, they made me feel welcomed and I can say I didn’t feel like a guest I felt like family 🙏🏽 I pray God’s blessings on them and I look to be returning again in the future.

Brenda's place was wonderful. It is located in a beautiful,
quiet setting. Very clean and decorated tastefully. I would highly recommend it to anyone.
Peaceful retreat in a convenient location. You feel like you’re in the country. Even saw a doe with twin fawns when walking through the neighborhood one evening.
Awesome place, no complaints whatsoever.
Great spot

Went for the weekend for bike riding along the pine creek trail. The Airbnb was only a few miles aaway from “ the hub” of lock haven but so quiet.very close to a few very good breakfast places and the town was having an annual weeekend music festival which brought liveliness to Main Street .we love the surrounding area and found the space comfortable,quiet,clean and welcoming,we even saw a mama deer and her 2 fawns getting drinks at the pond behind the apartment, we are planning on making this an annual weekend and hope to come back to Brenda’s. Thanks for opening your home to visitors

My stay was very comfortable! The apartment had a very cozy vibe, all the sheets were clean & comfortable. The bathroom was also extremely clean. The location is great because it’s less than 8 minutes to a grocery store & has many local restaurants nearby.

This was a great location for me to stay at to prepare for a half-triathlon at Penn State, about a 15-20 minute drive away. It was very private, had a place to park, albeit a bit narrow but very doable. Brenda also provided very clear check-in and check-out instructions. I recommend this stay as a quiet, relaxing place to spend your weekend for any activities.
The perfect stay while we were in town for a wedding. Exactly as advertised and very cozy. Would definitely stay again if we find ourselves in the area!

What a beautiful location!! Totally private on a no outlet street, with huge pine trees, and a pond down a slight slope of lawn. Loved the privacy of sitting on the patio in the morning with my coffee enjoying the squirrels and birds at the feeders. All this and only minutes from every place I needed to be.
The inside was pristine, cozy and comfortable! Big fluffy towels in an immaculate bathroom. Lots of amenities including a wireless phone charger! Fully equipped kitchen! Loved the warm decor and perfect selection of books! I couldn’t have been happier and the price was great! Would definitely enjoy another stay!
Clean, comfortable home. Cute place in a quiet town.
Very comfortable for a get away. Clean and cozy. The place was perfect for just my wife and I.

Brenda’s place was very clean and comfortable and was perfect for our weekend stay! Everything we needed was there and the hosts were pleasant and readily available. We were especially happy that it was just minutes from Lock Haven University. Thank you for all the amenities!

Doug and Brenda's place was so cozy, comfortable, clean and quiet. This place is on a no outlet end of a quiet street. The apartment was well decorated and everything appeared new. I really enjoyed my stay. I would highly recommend this place.
Beautiful, quiet property, the guest house is comfortable and feels like a home away from home. Everything you need is already provided in the home. Highly recommend staying here!

Patti is an excellent host, very communicative and courteous and shared lots of useful information. The location was great, very scenic and serene. The Bear Pen guest house was very clean and fully stocked with all the necessities. We had a great time and will definitely return here.
Absolutely lovely place to stay!!
Beautiful spot, great views, nice and quiet

We had a great stay at the Bear Pen guesthouse. Patti is a gracious host and the cozy apartment had everything we needed. It's a beautiful property, perched on a mountaintop with amazing views. The grazing horses added to the peacefulness of the setting.

It is a quiet place, perfect to relax and get away from everything, Patti was very kind and solved my doubts.
The place was very comfortable and warm, they had very adorable and friendly dogs, everything was to my liking

Patti was absolutely a perfect host. The guest house was so serene and private but even when we didn’t get ketchup for our dinner Patti’s let us go to her home to borrow some. She was extremely responsive and gracious. The property was so magical, from the farm with horses to the incredible views above the mountains. Just a picturesque landscape to get away. Highly impressed and recommended.
This was our 2nd stay and we loved it! Great spot, quiet and beautiful views!
The place was very clean and just as described. Would definitely stay again.

My wife and I have stayed at Patti's place (The Bear Pen) before and it always meets our expectations. In fact, it is the nicest Airbnb that we have visited, and we have stayed at some great locations. Patti is a terrific host!!
My family loved our stay at Patti’s place and we plan on coming back in the future. It was very private and peaceful out on the mountain with beautiful views. It was very clean and really cozy.
Really enjoyed our stay here! Very peaceful and quiet, you can almost hear a pin drop. Also, the views were spectacular!

Thank you for the lovely stay and sharing your little piece of heaven with us. Appreciate all the attention to details and the yummy snacks. My only suggestion is make sure you find the place during the day time!

The place was spotless and just as described. Beautiful area with much to see. Patti checked on us often, but the house was stocked with everything we needed. Saw a few deer, many turkeys in the area. Can only imagine the area during Fall foliage. Can't wait for our next trip back to Bear Pen.

Love this place so much! We visit the area many times each year. This was our second stay at the Bear Pen and we’ll never stay anywhere else in the Pennsylvania Wilds again. Absolute comfort and peace at a home in the mountains away from home!
If you’re looking for serenity, look no further! Patti’s place was a spectacular way to wind down, write, and just unplug. Patti was such a kind host, Will definitely return!
Beautiful place to stay; would definitely recommend and stay again.😊
This place was fantastic! So clean and accommodating to all our needs! The snacks were so wonderful, as well as the view! Would highly recommend!!
Patti’s place was perfect for our family. We really enjoyed all she had to offer and the place and surroundings were peaceful and quiet!!!
In the end, my schedule changed and I was unable to stay at Patti's listing, but Patti was very kind, understanding, and easy to communicate with.

What a wonderful space to stay—super comfortable, gorgeous mountain top views, delightful warm and welcoming host. We have been coming to this part of PA for ultra running, cycling, hiking, and more for over 5 years and can’t believe we only just found this heavenly spot. Have already booked again for our next visit and we only checked out today!
Great weekend. Beautiful place
Quiet, clean, relaxing. Beautiful view of rolling hills in the backyard, which was especially nice in early October.

Absolutely the best!! Patti is a gracious host! The property is beautiful, the guest house is perfect for 2-3 people or a small family. Everything needed is there for you and if you need anything, just ask. I will not hesitate to book again if I will be visiting the area. Thank you Patti for making my stay awesome!!!
Patti is a wonderful host. Easy to communicate with and very friendly. Her place is spotless and extremely relaxing. Just right for some quiet time in nature!
Great experience. Great communication. Easy check in easy check out. All the amenities you might need in the kitchen. Beautiful views. Really a wonderful little gem in the middle of nature.
The apartment is clean and well stocked for two people. The pictures don’t do it justice!! Patti is a wonderful hostess.

To anyone who is interested in renting this property for any reason I highly suggest that you do the price is very reasonable. Our host Patti was so very friendly informative and helpful that we highly recommend that you consider your stay there.We can't say enough good things about our experience we hope to return again next year.

Patti is a wonderful Host, the place and accomodations are top notch. Turkeys came in many mornings and beautiful deer both bucks and does came in every evening. It was a great get away not too far from town (about 8 mins) and many times when driving into or back from town we'd see additional deer not far from the road. The view is sweet. I bet when the leaves change and when it snows or snow is on the ground it is an even more awesome view. It is everything as advertised. Patti is very gracious and helpful.
I wholeheartedly recommend the Bear Pen Guest House especially for anyone wanting to be out of town but not too far and looking for just the right place. If I get back in the area it will, without question, be my choice location to be. You won't be disappointed!

We had a fantastic time at the Bear Pen Guest House, Patti is an amazing host and made sure that even the small details were taken care of. We wish to return soon and will spread the word to our friends and family.
The location itself is on a serene mountaintop and one has a view of the valley from a point on the property, the night sky is amazing on a clear night and the dwelling itself is cozy with access to decent internet ( clocked approx 12 MBps download :) ) that is if you need it! Everything was spotlessly clean and we tried to leave it that way :)
Storm and Thunder are two horses and Romeo is a 4 month (at the time of writing) puppy, he is still in his training phase but so adorable and loving!
Do visit Hyner View State Park(not to be confused with Hyner State Park) for some epic views and Bald Eagle State Park for some fun time at the beach. Stella A's has some lovely dining options and we were treated to live music on a Saturday night.
I highly recommend the place if you are looking for some quiet nature time in a picturesque setting!

This place is wonderful ! Patti is an exceptional host :)
The property is incredibly special, and the guest house is perfectly clean and comfortable!
Also, I needed to have strong Wi-Fi and cell service for working remotely during my stay, and it was exceptional.
very comfy and a quiet peaceful place would reccomend

We may have had a rough start due to communication gaps (a day before the trip) but things were sorted out the same day. And once we reached there, we quickly fell in love with the place. Patti is an amazing host! It truly felt like a vacation home atop a quiet mountain with scenic view and farm animals like horses. My family felt well taken care of because the home was very clean, organized and had warm touches with great amenities overall. There were sweet and savory snacks, all kitchen essentials, personal toiletries, area maps and guides, magazines, games, TV - perfectly well stocked for a cottage. Plus point is the location as it is just 10mins away from all the stores and between 15 to 40 mins of drive time, there are several wonderful state parks to explore.

Whatever is described about this property and whatever has been written in reviews cannot truly state how beautiful and comfortable it is. If you want to be in the mountains but close to conveniences and so many out of doors things to do, this is the place. But beyond the physical property offerings the owners are even better. They respond to every need quickly and are simply fantastic people. My wife and I will definitely return as frequently as possible.

Nice quiet location. Away from it all. Very nice firepit with wood provided, big bonus for me.
Bed was very comfy and the Hybes state Park overlook is close enough for a day trip.
Patti is very friendly and her house is not very far mother in law Suite rental.
Everything was super easy, well maintained and the level of care and communication was phenomenal! We will definitely be back again!

This place was the perfect weekend getaway. Patti had everything perfectly arranged for us, from snacks to a warm welcome note. We really had a great time watching movies from the collection of DVDs she has, and the views from the mountain were amazing. Also got to see some bears in the area which was amazing!
An amazing get away! So calm and relaxing. Patti was a wonderful host and the animals are a great bonus of the time you'll be there. The space was perfect for our 1st anniversary. Highly recommend
We love staying here. Beautiful location and well kept place with the perfect space for our family to stay.
We had a wonderful time. There was one minor issue that they took care of immediately. Very clean, well - stocked kitchen, nice towels. Nice hiking on the grounds. Would definitely go back.
A very pretty property, you will see animals around for sure! Loved that aspect

Patti was a wonderful hostess. She checked in on us a few times during our stay and even asked if we needed food. She left a small gift for my son which put a huge smile on his face. The guest house was beautiful, peaceful and comfortable. I’m looking forward to more trips to Patti’s in the near future.

The Bear Pen Guest House was exactly as advertised, tucked away on a beautiful mountain overlooking the valley. It was easy to get to from cities and towns in the area, but felt secluded enough to get away from the hustle and bustle. The home itself was comfy, and perfect for laying back and reading or watching some TV. It will be my go-to spot for planning trips in the area.

Fabulous hosts. Extra amenities- even Valentines candy! Very homey and warm. This is the only place I have gone and DIDN’T feel the need to clean or disenfect! Beautiful setting. Relaxation at its best! Definitely need 4wheel in February.
We had a wonderful stay at the Bear Pen Guest House! The apartment is clean and cozy and the view is incredible!

My stay was nothing short of amazing. Our host was in touch leading up to my trip and made sure everything was to my liking. The house was extremely clean, organized and welcoming when we arrived. The location and house exceeded my expectation and I look forward to visiting again very soon.
Beautiful place, super clean, and the Host is very nice. Would come back again!
Very nice private place to stay.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at the Bear Pen Guest house, and everything exceeded our expectations, from the beautiful forests and trails, stunning views, warm, cozy, clean apartment, and Patti and Duane's warm hospitality. We had a memorable time, and this is truly a special place that allowed us to rest and recharge in a beautiful wooded retreat. The guest accommodations were immaculate and very comfortable, and the hosts were helpful and friendly. Patti obviously pays attention to details, and we appreciated the treats, and coffee she provided. We would highly recommend this place to anyone. I can imagine this place is beautiful in all seasons, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter. We visited in winter and we were treated to a coating of snow, but I can only imagine how beautiful this place is in Fall with the leaves changing, and in spring when the Mountain Laurel is blooming. One last comment, if visiting in winter it is best to have a 4 wheel drive vehicle as the climb up the mountain, and then the lane to the guest house can be a challenge if it snows or is icey.

Amazing place !! It’s so cozy and relaxing . The view is spectacular! We definitely are coming back . Bless the homeowner for letting us stay and experiencing the wonderful place :) and they are so kind
Very good

The Bear Pen is a gorgeous place up in the woods. If you want a peaceful, beautiful get-away in charming central PA, you can't beat this house. It is somewhat remote, but the drive into town isn't long. The apartment had everything we needed and was very clean. We are already looking forward to our next stay.

The Bear Pen was absolutely lovely. Quiet, beautiful scenery and wildlife abundant! Patti provides a wonderful stay. Everything you could need is there and she went out of her way to give us a personalized experience! We had a busy weekend of our stay and would love to go back to be able to truly enjoy all that the place has to offer.

The Bear Pen Guest House is a great space and destination for a weekend getaway! We returned to The Bear Pen for our second stay to attend a Penn State football game (about a 50 minute drive) and plan to return again in the future! Patti was very accommodating, even warming up the space before we arrived! The space has all your basic needs and great views!!
Beautiful location! Will stay again for sure
Awesome place if you want to get away. Love the long drive way up to the place. The place is nice and quiet.
We loved the stay at Patti’s. The house is really beautiful and exactly as in the pictures (minus the bear;)) we’ll come back.

The Bear Pen Guest House is absolutely beautiful . . . a lovely, comfortable and well-maintained house . . . great location with amazing views! Back for our 2nd visit and it was just as wonderful as the 1st! We had a great time, and Patti is always so thoughtful 😊
the view was amazing, the location was great, local food was good as well, will be looking for a return trip
Great place to stay. Patti is great with replies over text or calls over the phone. Place was just as advertised. Super clean and comfortable
Patti’s guest house was clean and accommodating, and had a great view. She was a great host who was always available if we needed her. Can’t ask for much more.

This place is amazing! Cozy rooms, adorable animals and beautiful natural views are definitely beyond our expectation. We love this place so much and will definitely come back next time visiting lock haven.
Patti’s place was super clean! Very nice people with an amazing place on the mountain! Very peaceful and great views.

To Patti and Family,
We wish to profusely thank you all for the peaceful and beautiful respite at the Bear Pen on the mountain top. It was quickly apparent during our first stroll across the scenic view that we had made the right pick for a nature space to enjoy. Without a doubt, the Bear Pen experience was like having a slice of heaven served up for our relaxation and enjoyment. To those who might wonder, the pictures on the website are an understatement of the surrounding nature; the soaring birds, the whinnying of the horses throughout the days and nights, the bear peaking over the hilltop, walks through the woods and around the pasture trail ~ nature at its best. I truly loved my ability to sit down and talk turkey with my feathered friends on our last day. The turkeys taught me how to do the turkey trot as well as scratch the leaves for acorns. I think it was my scratching the leaves with them that made them want to sit, gab and gobble close by. We also treasured our many conversations with the entire family. Will always recall Riley handing us our arrival gifts. Mine was a small card that simply said “Younique.” Yes, the Bear Pen was a wonderful and “Younique” experience from beginning to end. Hope to return someday for more grand views, sweet smells of nature, and to once again interchange pleasant thoughts with our new furry, feathery and human friends.
Ramsey and Paula
What a great place! It was just as described...comfortable and very clean. Would definitely recommend and come back if we are in the area again.

Patti and her family were great hosts. They made us feel very welcomed, both with their hospitality and allowing us to walk and explore their property (which is beautiful).
The Airbnb itself looked exactly like the photos, and was very clean. It’s a fantastic getaway location, as it’s surrounded by nature far from other houses.
I’d highly suggest this Airbnb. I know that we’d like to stay again.

Patti's place was everything as described and more. The view from the mountaintop is exquisite, the apartment spacious, comfortable and very well-equipped. It was a tribute to the beauty of the area where she lives. We had a couple of great days biking parts of the Pine Gorge Trail and a relaxing and inviting place to come back to afterward. Communications with Patti were super-smooth. We would stay there again without hesitation and highly recommend it to anyone keen on visiting the area.
Beautiful place. We love the place and the views are spectacular! Patti is very responsive. We'll be back!!

What a fantastic place. We booked Patti's spot somewhat short-notice, and we are so glad we did! The surroundings are beautiful and peaceful, and we enjoyed our short weekend at the Bear Pen. Would recommend this spot highly to anyone looking for a quiet getaway - I know we hope to return!
Beautiful place, very friendly people, amazing view of stars at night.
I highly recommend the bear pen. The accommodations are on the top of a beautiful mountain and are so comfortable and peaceful. We look forward to visiting again.

This is our first trip since COVID, as my husband is immunocompromised. Patti's house is extremely clean and we felt very safe. I cannot applaud her efforts to make us feel safe and welcome. I can't begin to describe how beautiful this place truly is. The pictures do not do it justice. The outdoors are calming and soothing, mainly under tree cover. The place was fantastic and very cozy! Was ready to go and warmed up for us before we arrived. Patti even left us Memorial Day cookies as a surprise which was nice when we walked in! They had everything we needed in the kitchen and bathroom. Close to town and local hiking trails. Would definitely stay again.

Patti, our host was very welcoming and hospitable. The guest house is definitely a must stay. It is surrounded by acres of woodland and greenery. The view from the hill is impressive. Great, historic house. Nice location for visiting students at LHU. Comfortable beds and very clean. Outdoor space is fantastic. Would definitely stay here again!

Beautiful location on the river, just across the short walk from Lock Haven. Easy access to the trail or the town.
House had a ton of great amenities and was very clean. Would definitely stay here again!

Angela's Lock house was absolutely beautiful loved the views of my home town. Will always look to book with them first when visiting. Angela was always available for communication and was very accommodating!
Very nice little house on the water. Clean and plenty of room.

Lock Haven is always a peaceful stopping place and this home on the river does not disappoint.
Beautiful historic house in lovely setting. Enjoyed our stay and plan to visit again. Angela was very responsive and helpful. House was everything we hoped for - great for a family weekend away.

Close to outdoor activities (e.g., biking Pine Creek Rail Trail, hiking state forests, paddling the West Branch) with all the amenities of Lock Haven. Great place to stay! Super clean, host is very friendly, will be staying again.

very clean! 10/10 would stay again

Lovely accomodations. We got in late & left early, but check-in was easy. Quiet location. 10/10 will stay again. Great home base for state forest/park adventuring.

A lite continental breakfast was available. I would definitely stay here again.

The river room is a great place to stay in the Lock Haven area. It is beautifully decorated and right next to the university campus. Susan and Jack provide wonderful hospitality with coffee and homemade baked goods for breakfast.
I highly recommend Sue's Air BnB! Great location, very clean, and her hospitality is first class. I will definitely use her place again!
Sparkling clean and well maintained. Easy check in and out process. Everything we needed and more
Very clean and cute place! Looking forward to our next stay here

My wife and I had a very pleasant stay here. I wish we could have stayed a few more days to enjoy this home and the surrounding area more. Thank you Susan for being a great host! Sincerely, Lou and Lisa

What a lovely last minute getaway! Booked the morning of on a free Sunday night and had a great time.

Very cool place! Enjoyed our time there and the river and mountains are beautiful.
Beautiful place to enjoy a relaxing getaway!

Wish we had more than just one night at this peaceful and gorgeous getaway! Thanks so much Brady & John— we will be back!

A serene picturesque getaway

We had a great time, the place is exactly as the pictures.

We were searching for a much needed peaceful & private getaway and this place was absolutely perfect for it! Loved the unique decor and beautiful scenery. Everything looked even better in person. Everything felt right at home. It was an amazing get away.
Clean, private, and relaxing. Great host

Short and sweet stay at the Barndominium but it was a lovely little getaway. Fun and funky furniture, beautiful river views, peaceful place for a fire pit and stargazing. We loved it!

we loved the barndominium! the location was perfect, we loved being able to fish right from the property. the inside inside was spotless and inviting, creatively decorated and open but cozy at the same time! john & brady were very responsive with any questions or concerns that we had. would definitely recommend to a friend! First airbnb experience and the barn hit everything I was looking for. It was quiet and calm. The river right out back is such a great background. And the roads are absolutely amazing to drive on. Not a bad view anywhere you look.
We had the best time here. The pictures really don’t do the place, or the property justice. The property is so beautiful. We loved being right on the river.

Amazing

Loved our stay!! The river was beautiful and the wildlife was plenty!! Awesome place!!
Great experience.

Aaamazing! My husband and I came here for our anniversary. The barndamonium is as beautiful as the pictures and the view is magical! State of the art appliances and such a creative use of the space. We loved it here!

Great place to stay

Ten years ago, my wife and I started a tradition of taking our two daughters (who are now 18 and 15) away to a cabin over Easter weekend. This year we chose to stay at John and Brady’s Barndominium for our annual getaway, and it did not disappoint. The location offers great views of the surrounding landscape, including the beautiful Susquehanna river, along with easy access to the bank of the river. And while we thoroughly enjoyed the grounds of the property, the “barn” itself is the real gem. We have typically stayed in more traditional cabins, so this was a break from the ordinary, but we LOVED it. The openness of the one room floor plan along with the gorgeous live edge furniture pieces, tasteful decor, and those amazing windowed garage doors creates such a unique experience. It was the perfect way to celebrate a decade of our tradition of unplugging and soaking in time with the people we love the most. Thanks, John and Brady, for providing such us with such a memorable weekend!

Fantastic stay! The loft space was perfect for the kids with 2 extra beds. Lots of room to move around and spread out. The abundant seating and tables was especially nice to have dedicated areas for games and hanging out. The outdoor area offered a lot of space to hangout and enjoy the view.
The place is amazing. So peaceful and relaxing. It was exactly what we where looking for.

This place is absolutely perfect. It is right on a river and has the most beautiful views. For two single traveling women we would’ve liked a lock on inside.

I definitely recommend this place and look forward to possibly booking it again.

Brady and John’s space was beautiful. They have great attention to detail within the space and everything needed was available. They are responsive to any requests. I would definitely stay here again!

We loved the Barndominium! The space itself is beautiful and was the perfect place to spend a weekend away. The kitchen is very well-stocked and the views of the river and nature are fantastic. We only wish it had been warm enough to enjoy a fire and stargazing

Great stay! The place looks just like the pictures and together with our cats we felt right at home. Would recommend this space if you’re in the area!

Cute little place. Can be very noisy late at night. Luckily the ac/fan unit did a good job of blocking some of the noise. Shower water temperature was finicky. Overall, it served us well for the weekend.
We had a great stay! The studio is cozy and clean and we felt right at home. We appreciated the fact that it is pet friendly. Would definitely recommend and stay again in the future ￼:)

We just came for a quick little weekend getaway. The space was really nice, we joked about wanting to permanently rent it. Loved the exposed brick, the rain shower and the wood beams! The hosts were very responsive and friendly and we really appreciated how clean the space was. I honestly am forgetful with reviewing spaces I stay at but I made it a point to remember to review this one because it deserves it. Beautiful apt to rent for an Airbnb. Had a great stay and will look to rent again if I come back. The apt is right above Odd Fellas too, so very convenient location.

Thanks, Josh!
Great location. Lots of local restaurants and shops within walking distance. The loft was spacious, had cool vibes, and made for the perfect weekend getaway.
As always, Joshua and Sarah’s place was perfect. I love staying with them when I’m in town. Thank you for always being so warm and welcoming.

So grateful for Joshua and Sarah for being such great hosts! We were enduring a bad winter storm during my stay and they were super accommodating with my check in and check out times! A very comfortable stay as always!

A pet-friendly space surrounded by restaurants and shops in a picturesque small college town. The unique, immaculate apartment is easy to find and Joshua is an ultra-responsive host. Take a few minutes to stroll the nearby river walk. Look to Lock Haven as a weekend getaway or stopover under three hours from NYC.

Joshua was a great host and made sure our check-in went smooth. The space is very cute and cozy with a lot of historic charm. It was also well stocked with extra toiletries just in case you forgot something. The only issue we had was the noise both inside and outside. The tenants in the building were not loud or anything but everything seems to echo in the building. There is also a bar on the same block which can be very loud outside at 2am. The noise machine they provided was helpful.
As advertised. Good place for the price.

The hosts were communicative and friendly, instructions for check-in were easy and clear, and the apartment was just as described! If you are a light sleeper, the activities of neighbors and/or street noises may be an issue for you. If you are a deep sleeper (like me), then it is less likely to bother you. The heat worked well despite being cold outside and we had no issues with the plumbing. Parking wasn’t an issue overnight and we left early before meter monitoring started. Overall, a good stay and would stay again! Would love to walk the town when it’s warmer and explore more shops and restaurants outside of a holiday weekend.
Classy and very clean. Thank you for the wonderful crash pad on our way to NYC!
As always, Josh and Sarah are extremely accommodating! Loved my stay at this Airbnb. Such a relaxing experience!
Super cute and spacious studio. We will definitely stay again when in the area.

Place was unique, clean and great location to downtown activities. Would recommend to anyone who doesn’t want just a hotel experience.

Great studio! Had a wonderful stay. Thank you!

Joshua’s place was super comfortable and had everything I needed for my stay. The kitchen was well stocked. The space is really cute and comfy. The bed was very comfortable! Great place!

perfect for visits Lock Haven, located right downtown, with plenty of places to dine, and shop.

can highly recommend.

Fantastic studio apartment right in the heart of lock Haven! so many shops, restaurants and bars within walking distance. It was a wonderful place for a weekend getaway!

I had a great stay at Joshua's, and recommend it for any individual or couple looking to stay in downtown Lock Haven. The kitchen has the basics, the A/C kept me cool during the warm summer nights, and parking/access was a breeze. It was nice and clean, too.
A nice place, and a nice host! I wouldn't hesitate to book a second stay.

Great in-town location! Great for a weekend getaway! Has plenty of surrounding food, entertainment, adventure, etc etc!! Great old restored building! The place was actually cool. It is an old building but has been updated and had a very eclectic feel. The only issue was the noise outside and from the people below us. The The bathroom and counter space were spacious and easy access to different eateries were a bonus.

Such a cute Airbnb! The town was really quaint. We got in late but there was a good little bar and grill still open called The Corner Street Bottle Shop. It was really good. The parking is on street and there are meters. They are free after 6pm.

perfect for my one night stay. super comfortable, clean and conveniently located to lots of great restaurants. Joshua was super helpful, flexible and responded promptly when i had questions. We loved apartment and location was great - right downtown. Josh was friendly and responsive. Bed was very comfortable and the shower was very good. Would definitely stay there again. Highly recommend!
Great loft, great host.
This was a great stay for us while passing through on a road trip. Cool old building in a great location. Very helpful and communicative host.

Joshua, was very accommodating and responds promptly. The location is in the heart of downtown.
the loft was clean and well stocked. did not need to contact the host for any reason as every thing was ready and I had no issues. would recommend.
Great location, loved the town and nearby bike path and Piper Museum! Very comfortable, cool loft apartment.
I love the experience i had and host was wonderful ave very attentive and made sure i was comfortable. Definitely will stay again!
Great location and just what was needed for our stay! Very quick communication!
